122a2: 'das kyis yul dbus su l+h+wa ma sgrog gunan bcad par mi bya'o zhes bka' stsal bas 'di de la sbyin no snyam nas/ des lham sgrog gu can de de la byin pa dang / des gnas gni byed du bcug ste der bzhag pard
122a3: kha cig gis ni lham gyi dbang phyug cis phye bar shes so/ / kha cig gis lham gyi gzhi zhes bya bar shes so// tshe dang ldan pa kA tA yan chen po mthar gyis mnyan yod du phyin nas dge slong rnams kyis mthong nas smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'ongs pa legs so//
122a4: dos pa legs so// ji lta bde bar brgyus pam/ des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag cung zad bde bar yang brgyus/ cung zad sdug bsngal bar yang brgyus so// dge slong rnams kyis smras pa/ ji ltar bdabang brgyus/ ji ltar bsdug bsngal bar brgyus/ des smras pa/ mas
122a5: can gyi bya ba byas pa gang yin pa de dag ni bde bar brgyus pa yin no/ / rgyal po gtsug phud can dang / grong khyer skra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs kyis bdags sa mnan pa gang yin pa dang / blon po'i mchog he ru ka dang k+Shi rI/ gnyis tshogs chen pos bros pa gang yin
122a6: de ni sdug bsngal bar brgyas pa yin no/ / dge slong don nyid du dag gis smad de smras pa/ de ni pha bsod pa yin te/ des tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya na dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa bsad de/ 'di ni de'i me tog tsam yin gyi 'bras bu ni gzhan
122a7: 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa tshe dang ldan pa u tra ya nas las ci bgyis na des phyug pa nor ma la longs spyod che ba'i khyim du skyes shing /
122a8: bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/ dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du bgyis nas mtshon gyis bkum par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag dge slong u tra ya na nyid kyis

122b1: las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'dod pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur bas dag byas shing bsags pas u tra ya na nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge
122b2: slong dag las byas shid bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par mi 'gyur/ tshub khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge pa dang m-i dge ba byas shing gsags pa dag ni zan
122b3: pa'i phung po dang / khams dang skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las rnams bskal la ba rgyar yang ni/ chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus// rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ 'bra bu dag du 'gyur ba nyid// dge slong dag sngon 'byung ba 'das pa'i dus nas das//
122b4: rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang / bkren pa la rjes su snying brdze ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ ba se ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo // ji tsam na ri brags shig na
122b5: rngon pa zhig 'dug ste/ ri brags de dang ha car mi ring ba zhig na ri dgas dang bya mang po dag gi rten du gyur ba ma tshe'u zhig yod pa der rngon pa de nyi ma re re zhing ri dgas dang bya mang po dag drung dbyung ba'i phyir dang / nyams par bya ba'i phyir dang / tshul ma yin pa
122b6: sdug bsngal bar bya ba'i phyir rngon sprang dang / snyi dang rnyod mang po dag 'dzugs par byed do// de'i rngon spad dang / snying dang rnyod de dag kyang don yod pa yin no// je tsam dus gzhan zhig na rang sangs rgyas shig ljong sargya zhing song ba na ri thegs der phyin nas lha'i
122b7: gnas shig tu mtshan mo gnas par khas blangs nas de snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te ri brags der bsod snyoms la zhugs so/ / der bsod snyoms brgyas nas bsams pa/ lha'i gnas 'di nyin mo rgyun lugs mang ba yin
122b8: gyis/ ji thags kyi phyi rol gyi gnas zhi ba zhig tu bsod snyoms bzo'o snyam nas de'i brags nas byung ste/ 'di ni zhiba'o// 'di ni zhi ba'o zhes mtshe'u degal ba der sor te phyin nas lhung bzed dang chu tshegs mtha' cig tu bzhag ste rkang pa gnyis bkrus nas lag pa

123a1: gnyis bskul te chu btsags nas/ lo ma lhags pa dag blangs te 'dug nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ lag pa gnyis bsnyal nas kha bkrus te lhung bzed dang / chu tshags gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bzhag nas/ dang
123a2: gnyis bkrus te shing drung zhig tu brten nas brang 'gro'i rgyal po nyal ba'i lus bskyil ba ltar dkyil dkrung bcas te spyod lAm zhi bar 'dug pa dang / de'i nyin ma ma'o dris ri dgas gcig kyang ma zin to// de nas ston pa de nang par
123a3: sngar langs te mtshe'u de ga la ba der song nas/ des rngon spya da dang / snyi dang drong de dag byul bar brtsams pa dang / ri dag so gcig kyang ma mthong nas des 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rngo na spyad dang / snying rlod 'di dag
123a4: don yod pa yin no/ gang gi phyir dang ri dgas gcig kyang ma zin pa 'di'i b+ha gang yin snyam nas/ des tshe 'u de'i thon kor byal bar brtsams pa dang mi rjes parjo nas/ de rjes de'i phyi bzhin du song ba dang / rang sangs rgyas smod lam zhi
123a5: bar 'dag pa de mthong nas des bsams pa/ rab tu byung ba sems zhi ba 'di dag gnas 'di lta bu dag du mngon par dga' bar byed pas gal te bdag gis 'di'i srog bcad pa ma byas na 'di dag gis nges par bdag gis 'tsho ba gcod
123a6: par byed kyis rnam pa thams cad du 'di gsad par bya'o snyam nas/ snying rje med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten pha rol btang ba nges mnga' dug can gyis zhu Ta'i dbyibs 'dra ba rna drung du thug par bkang te rang sangs rgyas de'i gnang du bsku
123a7: to/ rang sangs rgyas bdag nyid chen po des bsams pa/ rngon pa nyon mongs pa 'di ha cang spras pa deng / nyams par gyur na mi rung gis/ 'di la la gnas drang ba sbyin no snyam nas des dang pa'i rgyal po 'dab ma brkyang ba ltar steng
123a8: mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas 'bar ba dang / gsal ba dang / 'char 'bebs pa dang / klog 'byin pa'i cho 'phrul dag bya bar brtsams so// so so'i skye bo na rdzu 'phrul la myur du sems gtong bar byed pa yin pas rngon pa de shing ljon

123b1: brtsab nas bcad pa bzhin du rang sangs rgyas de'i rkang pa gnyis kyi drung du skyel nas smras pa/ yon gnas yang dag par gyur pa mang gshegs su gsol/ mar gshegs su gsol/ nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba bdag gi sug pa nas
123b2: drang bsul du gsol/ rang sangs rgyas de rngon pa de la rjes su snying brtse ba'i phyir steng gi mkha' las shod du babs so// de nas rngon pa de zug du med par byas te/ rma ldan gyis klan nas smras pa/ 'phags pa sdum par gshegs su gsol/ lag te 'di gser gyi
123b3: ldan pas klan par mdzad na de yang bdag gis sbyar bar bgyi'o/ / rang sangs rgyas kyis bsams pa/ bdag gis rnag gi lus 'dis thob par bya ba gang yin pa thob zin pas de'i phyir nga ni phung pa'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su 'dug
123b4: bar bya'o snyam nas/ de rngon pa nyid kyi mdun du yang nam mkha'i dkyil du 'phags te/ cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs dag rnam par bstan nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das so// rngon pa de nor dang ldan pa yin pas nges
123b5: spos kyi shing thams cad kyis phung por bcer te bsregs nas phung po de 'o mas zhi bar byas te/ dus pa de dag gser gyi bum par gcuganas lam po che'i gzhi mdor lus kyi mchod rten rtsig tu bcug ste/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdun dag
123b6: bsgreng zhing dri dang / 'phreng ba rgyu dang / bdug spos dang / phye ma dang / sil snyan dag gis mchod pa byas nas rkang pa gnyis la phyag 'tshal te smon lam 'di skad ces/ bdag yon gnas dam par gyur pa 'di lta bu la gnod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i
123b7: las de'i cha dang 'thun par mi 'gyur bar mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che bar skyes shing 'di bas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa mnyes par byed cing thugs byung bar mi byed pa'i
123b8: yon tan gyi rnam pa de lta bu thob par gyur cig ces btab bo/ dge slong dag de la de'i tshe de'i dus na rngon pa gang yin pa de ni dge slong u tra yan yin te/ des rang sangs rgyas kyi gnad du mda' dug can gyis bsnun pa gang yin pa'i las de'i

124a1: r nam par smin pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba chen por mnad med par gdungs nas las de nyid kyi lhag mas tshe rabs lnga brgyar mtshe'u de nyid du ri dgas su gyur nas mda' dug can gyis gnang du bskrun cing dus la
124a2: bab ste/ da ltar gyi bar du yang dgra bcom pa thob kyang de mtshon gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// mchod pa byas nas smon lam btab pa gang yin pa des ni da ltar skyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che bar gyes shing de'i bstan pa la
124a3: rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing / 'dis rang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag 'bum pas ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i ston pa nga mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so// dge
124a4: slong dge de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig tu gnag pa yin la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/ las 'dren pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang
124a5: 'dren ma yin no/ / dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams dang 'dren pa rnams spangs te/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyed kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o yang dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas
124a6: the tshom thams cad bcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa rgyal po gtsug bud can dang / grong khyer skra grogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po sa las ci bgyis na des dog sas non par gyur/ blon po'i
124a7: mchog he ru ka dang / d+hi ru ka gnyis kyis las ci zhig bgyis na bros par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bstsal pa/ dge slong dag de dag nyid kyis las tshogs rnyed pa/ rkyen yongs su bsgyur ba/ 'od pa bzhin du nye bar gnas pa/ gdon
124a8: mi za bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag byas shing bsags pas de dag nyid kyis las byas shing bsags pa dag gzhan su zhig gis so sor myong bar 'gyur/ dge slong dag las byas shing bsags pa dag ni phyi rol gyi sa'i khams la rnam par smin par//

124b1: mi 'gyur/ chu khams la mi 'gyur/ me'i khams la mi 'gyur/ rlung gi khams la mi 'gyur gyi/ 'di ltar las dge ba dang mi dge ba byas shing bsags pa dag ni zin pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dag la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/ las
124b2: rnams bskal pa brgyar yang ni/ chud mi za ba'ang tshogs dang dus/ rnyed na lus can rnams la ni/ 'bras bu dag tu 'gyur ba nyid/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba ri brags shig na khyim bdag zhig 'dug pa des rigs mnyam pa las chung ma blangs nas
124b3: de de dang lhan cig rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed do// rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa de la bu khye'u zhig byung ngo // yang rtse bar byed/ dga' bar byed/ dga' mgur spyod par byed pa/ de la bu mo zhig byung
124b4: nas/ de gnyis bsrings shing bskyed de chen por gyur to// bu mo do dang na mnyam pa'i bu mo dag slong ba 'ongs na/ bu mo do la slong ba 'ga' yang ma 'ongs so// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying
124b5: brtse bas/ bas mthi' gnas mal la dga' ba bse ru lta bu gcig pu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byu ngo/ ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas shig ljongs rgyu zhing song ba na ri brags der phyin nas bu mo dos khrim phyag nas phyag dang rib ma'i
124b6: steng nas bor ba de rang sangs rgyas bsod snyoms la nu ba de'i mgo la phog go/ / bu mo dos der phog pa mthong nas 'gyod pa'i sems kyang ma skyes la/ stes dbang gis de nyid kyi nyin mo de spangad ba 'ongs nas ming pos de la dris pa/ deng khyod kyis ci byas
124b7: na des na khyod slong ba 'ongs/ des smras pa/ bdag gis der rab tu byung ba'i steng du phyag dang bor ro// des 'dzum phyung ba dang / bu mo des bu mo gzhan dag la sbran cing des kyang gzhan dag la sbran nas/ 'jig rten la bu mo gang dang gang slong ba mi
124b8: 'ong ba des rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor na de la slong ba 'ong ngo zhes sdig pa can gyi lta ba'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo / / bdag nyid chen po rnams ni bsnyen bkur ma yin pas 'jigs pas rang sangs rgyas de ri brags de nas song ba dang / drang

125a1: srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa rnams kyi steng du dor bar brtsams nas de dag kyang dong ba dang / pha ma dag gi steng du ngong ba brtsams so// ri brags de na khyim bdag dge ba'i chos can gnyis shig 'khod pa de gnyis kyis
125a2: smras pa/ shes ldan dag dam pa ma yin pa'i chos 'phel ba 'di bzlog par bya'o zhes de gnyis kyis bzlog cing spangs so// dge slong dag de tshe de'i rus na bu mo gang gis rang sangs rgyas kyi steng du phyag dar bor ba de ni rgyal po gtsug
125a3: phud can 'di yin no/ / ri brags da na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs gang yin pa de ni grong khyer sgra sgrogs na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs 'di dag yin te/ 'di dag gis rang sangs rgyas dang / drang srong dang / pha ma dag gi steng du phyag dar bor ba gang yin
125a4: pa de'i las kyi rnam par sbyin pas sas non par gyur to/ / khyim bdag gnyis kyis bzlog pa gang yin pa de ni blon po'i mchog hi ru ka dang / b+hi ru ka gnyis yin te/ las de'i rnam par smin pas bros par gyur to// bu mo'i ming po gang gis
125a5: 'dzum phyung ba de ni dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen po yin te/ des 'dzum phyung ba gang yin pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sas g.yogs te/ gal te dge slong kA t+yA ya na chen pos yon tan gyi tshogs 'di lta bu rtogs par ma gyur du zin na/ dge
125a6: slong kAt+yA ya na chen po yang sas non cing tshul ma yin pas/ sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// dge slong dag de ltar na las gcig tu gnag pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ni gcig du gnag pa yin la/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams kyis rnam
125a7: par smin pa yang gcig tu dkar ba yin/ las 'dren ma rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yang 'dren ma yin no// dge slong dag de lta bas na las gcig tu gnag pa dang 'dren ma rnams spangs te/ las gcig tu dkar ba rnams la
125a8: brtsal bar bya ste/ dge slong dag khyod kyis de ltar bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so// kau sham+bi na khyim bdag nor bzangs shes

125b1: bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba zhig 'dug pa de'i khyim rgyal po shar ba'i drung na 'dug cing de nang par sngar langs te las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'gro'o// de dbyig gi gdangs can yin pas rgyal po shar bas sgri'i gdangs
125b2: las de la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod par shes so/ / ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po shar ba don gyi gnas na 'dug pas blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyim bdag nor bzangs nyi ma re re zhing nang par sngar langs te rang nyid
125b3: las kyi mtha' dag la rtog tu 'dre ste/ 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod ces grag na ci'i phyir bdag nyid ngal bar byed/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lha 'di la gser bzhag pa 'bum ga la mchis te/ gal te 'di la gser gzhag pa
125b4: 'bum mchis na ci'i slad du bdag nyid ngal bar bgyid/ rgyas pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te khyed ca/ yid mchis na khyim bdag nor bzangs pos shig dang dri'o// de dag gis khyim bdag nor bzangs bos nas/ rgyal pos dris pa/ khyim
125b5: bdag khyod la gser bzhag pa 'bum yod dam/ lha mchis te/ gal te bzhed na bzhes su gsol/ khyim bdag/ de ni gser don du gnyer ba ma yin gyi/ 'di ltar ngas khyod la ci yod dam med
125b6: ces dri bar zad do/ / lha mchis te lhas ji ltar mkhyen pa de zhu'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod dbyig gi gdangs can yin pas ngas sgra'i gdangs las shes so// khyim bdag nor bzangs rgyal pos
125b7: gdangs las shes pas de'i ming khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bya bar gyur to/ / rgyal pos de la smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod phyug por gyur pa yin ni ci'i phyir khyod rang gis zhal ta byas te las kyi mtha' dag byed du 'jug/ des
125b8: smras pa/ lha gal te bdag gis rang gi zhal ta gyis te las kyi mtha' bgyid du ma stsal na/ bdag gi longs spyod dag 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang / yangs par yang mi 'gyur la/ lhas kyang bdag dbyig gi gdangs can legs par mkhyen

126a1: bar mi 'gyur ro/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyami bdag khyod ci'i phyir glang po tshe dang rta dag gis mi 'gro/ lta bdag khyim khol lags pas glang po che dang rta dag gse mchi ba bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma lags so// rgyal bas bsams
126a2: ba/ grogs 'di lta bus rgyal srid byed du gzhug par nus kyis/ 'di blon po kho nar gzhug go snyam du rig nas smras pa/ khyim bdag blon po kyis shig dang / lhan cig tu rgyal srid byed du gzhug go// des smras pa/ lha de skad bka' stsal pa mi rigs te/
126a3: bdag ni khyim kho la lags pas bdag zhing las kyi mtha' rjes su bsgrub par rigs kyi/ blon por mi rigs so// rgyal pos de lta de ltar nan gyis mnan na ci nas kyang gdon mi za bar khas len par shes te/ mnan nas des kyang khas blangs so// de
126a4: nas rgyal pos de blon por bcug nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis chos dang / rigs pas rgyal po'i bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag bya bar brtsams nas/ des blon po gzhan thams cad zil gyis mnan pa dang / de dag phrag dog skyes te yid mi
126a5: bde bar gyur nas 'dus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag 'di ltar khyim bdag gdangs can gyis zil gyis mnan par gyur na 'di la ji ltar bsgrub par bya/ de na kha cig gis smras pa/ 'di la ci'i phyir bsgrub tu med/ 'di ji srid gtan du gting
126a6: tshugs par ma gyur pa de srid du 'di la rgyal pos chad pas gcod du gzhug par bya'o/ / kha cig gis smras pa/ ma nyes kyis de ltar bya'o zhes de dag thams cad 'dus te rgyal po'i gan du dong nas smras pa/ lha rgyal po su lags/ des smras pa/ khyed cag
126a7: ga las the tshom za/ rgyal po ra yin modo gzhan su zhig yin/ de dag gis smras pa/ lha gdangs can rgyal po lags kyi khyod ni ma lags te/ gal te de 'tshal bar gyur na lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag
126a8: po bgyid du bstsol bar 'gyur ro/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ shes ldan dag ci'i phyir dede ltar 'gyur te/ de ni chos gtso bor byed pa yin pas ji ltar de ltar byed par 'gyur/ de dag gis smras pa/ bdag cag gis lci'i mngon sum du 'gyur bar ba gyi'o// rdo tsam dus

126b1: gzharan zhig na khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba'i rgol ba dang / phyir rgol ba dag gis yongs su bskor cing rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas/ rgyal po'i pho brang du thams cad skye bo'i tshogs kyis gang bang des rgyal po'i bya ba dang / rgyal po'i byed pa dag byas nas
126b2: rgal po'i pho brang nas phyir byung ba dang / rgyal pos nye bar 'tsho ba/ snga na 'khod pa dag kyang de dang lhan cig phyir byung ste rgyal po tshogs med par 'dug pa dang / blon po de dag gis rgyal po la smras pa/ lnga gzigs sam/ bdag cag gis gsol bapa/ gang lags pa de ni/
126b3: 'di lags te/ gal te 'di 'tshal bar gyur na lha bkrongs te rang nyid cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po bgyid du stsol bar 'gyur ro// rgyal pos bsams pa/ re shig 'di partag par bya'o snyam nas/ des de chu ba dang gnas pa las
126b4: brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na byang lam nas ded dpon gyis zong ta dang de gau sha s+thir phyini nas rgyal pos gdangs canapa bsgrog gser 'bum gyis da dag nyos shig des gse bus kyis nad gnyos pa dang / rgyal pos// dngas can la bsgo ba/ 'bum gyi phyed byin la 'di skad ces bdag gis 'bum
126b5: tshang bar byin zin to zhes byos shog/ des smras pa/ lha de mi rigs te/ gal te de ltar bgyis na sran cang 'dir chi bas rta 'tshong ba dang / gzhan 'ga' yang mchi bar mi 'gyur gyis 'di ltar lha'i dkor las 'bum phyed stsol cig dang bdag gis 'bum phyed
126b6: sal to/ rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag nga'i tshig de bzhin smras na 'di ci 'ga'/ des smras pa/ lha bdag gis tshe gcig sdug bsngal gyi don du tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par rngo mi thog go// rgyal pos de la lan gsum gyi bar du smras na yang dam
126b7: btub nas de nas rgyal pos blon po rnams la smras pa/ shes ldan dag gang gis rgyal po rgyal rigis spyi bor dbang bskur ba'i bka' lan gsum gyi bar du bcag pa de'i chad pa ci yin/ blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ lce de'i 'chad pa
126b8: ni dbum pa lags so/ / des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na ngas khyim bdag gdangs can yongs su btang ngo // blon po rnams kyis mi gshedas pa dag la bsgob/ shes ldan dag lhas bka' stsal la pa/ khyim bdag gdangs

127a1: can sod cig ces gyur ro/ / rgyal pos mi gshed ma pa de dag la gsang ste bsgo ba/ khyed kyis bya mi bdag gdangs can gsad par mi bya bar 'di ltar bsdigs par bya'o// de dag gis de'i mgrin par ka ra bi ra'i phreng ba
127a2: btags te grong khyer gyi dbum nas gsod/ sar khrid pa dang / de'i nye du dag dong te smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di la lhas bka' ci stsal pa de ltar gyis la bdag nyid gsod du ma bzhug shig/ des smras pa/ khobs lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa bcag
127a3: gam/ ci gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na gsod du zad/ kho bos tshe gcig gi sdug bsngal gyi phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so// mi gshed ma pa de dag gis de gsod sar khrid de smras pa/ khyim bdag
127a4: lhas bka' ci stsal pa de ltar gyi sa la bdag nyid gsod du ma gzhug shig/ des smras pa/ kho bos lha'i bka' chos dang ldan pa gcig gam ci/ gal te lhas kho bo nyes pa med pa/ gnod pa mi byed pa gsod na gsod du zad/ kho bos tshe gcig gi
127a5: sdug bsngal gyi phyir tshe rabs mang po'i sdug bsngal skyed par mi nus so/ / mi gshed ma pa de dag gis de rgyal po'i gan du khrid de smras pa/ lha khyim bdag gdangs can 'di 'di skad mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag da khyod gsad par
127a6: 'dod pa ma yin te/ 'di ltar brtag par 'dod do// des smras pa/ lhas bdag brtag pa'i dgongs pas gnas skabs 'di lta bu stsal na/ gal te bkyon na ji ltar bgyis par gyur/ 'di ltar gal te lha bdag la dgyes na bdag sbyin pa dag stsol cing
127a7: bsod nams dag bgyid par ci ga nang / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te de lta na gnang gis ci dgar sbyin pa dag byin cig/ gsod nams dag gyis shig/ de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/ sbyin pa'i
127a8: zhal ta ba mi bsgo nas smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te 'dir sngon ma thung ba'i rtags dang / cha lugs can gyi dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ gzhan dag 'ongs par gyur na kho bo la sbron cig/ ji tsam na lho lam nas drang srong lnga brgya cam

127b1: yul dbus su 'phags pa de dag mthar gyis lam du 'dod pa na dgon pa'i lam du byin nas de dag dgon pa'i nang du son pa na chu zad nas/ de dag chu dang bral nas/ skom gyis gdungs nas dgon pa'i lam der phan
127b2: tshun bral bar brtsams pa dang / de phan tshun nyul ba de dag gi sa ha cang thag mi ring ba na gsir ma sngon po'i phyogs na shing ljon pa zhig mthong nas de na kha cig gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag gser ma sngon po'i phyogs
127b3: 'din shing ljon pa zhig snang gis tshur sheg dang / / 'din chu yod par 'gyur gyi sa ltar 'dong ngo do// gzhan dag gis smras pa/ legs kyis de bzhin bya'o zhes de dag dong ba dang ji tsam na chu med
127b4: par mthong nas de dag gis gsol ba gdab par rtsams te/ / shes ldan dag sa phyogs dang shing ljon pa 'di la lha'am klu'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci'am/ lto 'phye chen po
127b5: gang gnas pa des bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya skom gyis gdungs pa rnams la chu byin cig ces smras so/ / ji tsam na shing ljon bde las lag pa rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa zhig gser gyi ril ba b+h+ri da gar thogs
127b6: te byung nas drang srong rnams kyis snyim pa bzed de/ chu btung bar brtsams nas/ ji tsam na myangs na chu yan la brgyad dang ldan pa yin te/ bsil ba dang / mngang ba dang / yang ba dang / 'jam pa dang / gsal
127b7: ba dang / dri rab med pa dang / 'thung ba na mgul la mi gnod pa dang / 'thungs pa na lto ma na pa yin te/ de dag tshim par gyur nas ril ba bkang ste shis pa brjod nas 'phags te dod pa dang de dag la blo skyes pa/ shes
127b8: ldan dag / bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin/ las gang gis 'dir skyes/ shes ma dris pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis/ chur sheg phyir log la dri'o snyam nas de dag thams cad 'ja

128a1: te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung du 'khod de smras pa/ shing ljon pa de la lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ dri za 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa gang gis bdag cag
128a2: dgon pa'i lam du song ba/ gnod pa dang nyam pa mi bde bar gyur cing 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas tshim par byas pa des bdag gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smros shig/ ji tsam na shing
128a3: ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par da/ ka' ba yin pas kho bo su yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas ji ltar smra bar bya/ drang srong rnams kyis smras
128a4: pa/ kye bdag cag gis mngon gsum kho nar mthong na ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/ the tshom ma za bar smros shig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na nyon cig dang / kho bo gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o// /
128a5: yul gos bdag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces bya ba de na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba 'jug pa de'i khyim drung na kho bo bzang mkhan byed cing 'jug 'dug ste/ de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed pas yul tha dad pa na gnas
128a6: pa'i slongs mo pa dag lhags shing kho bo la khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyi khyim gang yin zhes dris nas/ kho bos lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/ de dag la khyim bdag mgon med zas sprin gyis khyim 'di yin no zhes smras pa dang / de dag bri
128a7: sa lag pa yon gang ba dang / ste dad gang ba dang / 'byor pa thob pa dang / rnyed pa thob cing 'dod pa de dag kho bos mthong ngo // mthong nas mchog tu dga' ba skyed par byed de/ kho bo las des rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nad du skyes shing / shing ljon pa
128a8: 'di la gnas te/ de'i phyir kho bo'i lag pa g.yas pa shin du g+ham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur to// de dag gis shis pa brjod pas bstod/ dadong ngo // ji tsam phyogs gzhan zhig tu byin nas bza' ba dang btung bzad de/ de dag bkres pas gdungs shing skom

128b1: bas gdungs nas kun du brtag par brtsams pa dang / ji tsam na ha cang thag mi ring bzhig na shing ljon pa chen po lom sngo zhing snum pa zhig snang nas de dag gis smras pa/ shes ldan dag shing sngon pa chen po lo ma sngo zhing snum pa 'di lta bu snang ste/ sngar yang bdag cag
128b2: gis shing ljon pa 'di lta bu kho nas chu grub kyis 'dir 'dod dang gal te na chung zad 'thub par 'gyur ro zhes de dag der dong te gsol ba bdab par brtsams pa/ shes ldan dgas phyogs dang shing ljon pa 'di la lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mkha' lding dam dri za
128b3: 'am/ mi 'am ci la/ lto 'phye chen po gang gnas pa des bdag cag drang srong lnga brgya bkres pas gdungs pa dang skom pas gdungs pa rnams la zas dang skom byin cig ces smras so/ Ni tsam na shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag deng shig dang 'di nas ha
128b4: cang mi ring ba na rdzing bu zhig yod pa de'i 'gram nA shing ljon pa zhig yod pa de'i drung na 'bras can gyis bre bo gang zhing 'dug pa de las zos shing 'brangs nas bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer cig/ de dag dod pa dang / ji tsam na rdzing bu bya dang pa dang
128b5: ka ra na Ta ka dang / ngur bas mdzes par byas pa zhig 'dug pa de'i 'gram na shing ljon pa zhig 'dug pa de'i drung na 'bras can tshed ma sna tshogs dang bcas pas gang ba zhig 'dug pa mthong nas/ de dag gis der 'khrus byas te zos shing chu 'thungs nas ril ba chus
128b6: bkang ste bza' ba dang btung ba ci 'dod pa khyer rgas shis pa brjod de dong ba dang de dag la sgo skyes pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag gis de lta bu'i ya mtshan mthong nas de la khyod su yin/ las gang gis 'dir skyes shes ma dris pa ni bdag cag nyams pa yin gyis chung
128b7: sheg khyer log la dri'o snyam nas de dag thams cad 'dus te phyir log nas shing ljon pa de'i drung ngu la'odod mus pa/ shing ljon pa 'di la lha 'am/ bu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ nam mamakha' lding ngam / dri za'am/ maM 'amacha'/ phye chen po gang gnas ga

129a1: bdag cag dgon pa'i lam du song ba gnod pa dang / nyam pa dang / mi bde bar gyur cing 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la chu yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa dang / zas kyis tshim par byas pa das bdag gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa
129a2: smros shig/ ji tsaman shing ljon pa de las tshig byung ba/ shes ldan dag 'dza bu'i gling pa'i mi rnams ni yid ches par dka' ba yin pas kho bo su yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa yid ches par mi 'gyur bas ji ltar smra bar bya/ drang srong rnams kyis smras pa/ kye bdag
129a3: cag gis mngon gsum kho nar mthong na ji ltar yid ches par mi 'gyur/ the tshom ma za bar smros shig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag gal te de lta na nyon cig dang kho bo gang yin pa dang / las gang gis 'dir skyes pa smra bar bya'o// yul ko sa la dag na grong khyer mnyan yod ces
129a4: bya ba de na khyim bdag/ mgon med zas sbyin zhes bya ba zhig 'dug pa de mgon med pa rnams la zas sbyin par byed nas ri brags shig na bram ze zhig 'dug pa longs spyod srabs nas des bsams pa/ mnyan yod na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin bdug pa de mgon med pa rnams
129a5: la zas sbyin par byed kyis de'i gan du song na de las cung zad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / snyam nas de de'i gan du song ba dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun bshos gsol bar 'dod nas rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'phags pa na/ des de
129a6: mthong nas smras pa/ khyim bdag bdag la zas kyi 'gron gyis shig/ des de la smras pa/ bram ze tshur shog/ rgyal byed kyi tshal du 'dod la der zo shig/ de de dang lhan cig 'phags pa dang / ji tsam na khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis lam kar zho'i bum pa zhig rnyed nas des
129a7: de bram ze de la sbyin nas smras pa/ bram ze'i zho'i bum pa 'di dge 'dun brims shig/ khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun zhal zas bsod pas tshim par byas pa dang / bram ze des kyang zhe'i bum pa de dge 'dun la brims so// /
129a8: khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gdugs tshod gsol nas khyim bdag zan byin par brtsams te des khyim pa gzhan dag la ni zas bsod pa sbyin/ bram ze de ba ni ngan pa sbyin pa dang / des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag rab tu byu

129b1: rnams ni bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin pas re shig 'di dag la ni bsod pa byin par rigs na/ bdag cag khyim pa bslab pa yang dag par mablangs pa nga dran/ ci'i phyir byami pa gzhan dag la ni zas bsod pa sbyin la bdag la ni zas ngan pa sbyin
129b2: debade la smras pa/ bram ze khyim pa 'di dag kyang bslab pa yang dag par blangs pa yin te/ 'di dag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so// des de la smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te bdag gis kyang yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i
129b3: gso sbyong len na bdag la yang zas bsod pa sbyin nam/ des de la smras pa/ sbyin no// des yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa dang / de nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis de zas bsod pas tshim par byas nas des zos te
129b4: 'phags pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis smras pa/ bram ze yud tsam zhig sdod cig dang skom 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ des skom 'thungs te song ba dang nyi ma nub pa'i dus la bab nas mnyan yod dang ha cang mi ring ba na ri brags shig yod
129b5: pa der bram ze'i khyim zhig ru gnas pa dang / bram ze des depa smras pa/ bram ze zan zo shig/ des smras pa/ kho bos zan mi za'o// des smras pa/ ci'i phyir/ des smras pa/ kho bos dge sbyong gau ta ma la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs so//
129b6: des de la smras pa/ bram ze gal te re shig zan de stan legs/ gal te mi za na kho bo'i khyim du gnas par mi bya'o// des rus ma yin par zos nas gse sbyong ral lo/ ri brags na gnas pa'i bram ze gang yin pa gang gis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong
129b7: brangasanas dral pa de ni la bo yin te/ 'bos yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso spyong byas te/ thams cad ma thal na kho bo gsum bcu cu gsam pa'i lha rnams kyinang du skye bar 'azur bzhigan/ 'bos yan lag brgya dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong thas
129b8: dus ma yin par zos te/ gas sbyong dral pas kho bo rgyal chen pa ni'i lharnams kyi nang du skyes te/ shing ljon pa 'di la gnas shing kor phyir 'a bo la rgya chen pa zho'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis lha'i bu rdzu 'phrul cheb mthu che ba gso sbyong sa nas byab shes pa/

130a1: 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bam po bdun bcu rtsa gsum pa/ drang srong de dag mchog tu ngo mtshar skyes te smras pa/ shes ldan dag bdag cag drang srong rnams kyis dus 'di srid du brtul zhugs la gnas pas kyang 'di'i 'bras bu cir 'gyur mi shes na
130a2: lha'i bu gso sbyong ra la 'dis bram zer gyur pa na yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs shing / de dral na yang 'di rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes kyis/ bdag cag kyang gang du 'dis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyong blangs pa der 'dong ngo // de ltar bya'o zhes de
130a3: dag gis gros byas te/ mnyan yod du 'phags nas ji tsam na mthar gyis kau shim+bar phyin pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyi ston pa'i zhal ta byed pa'i mi rnams kyis de dag mthong nas/ de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la sbran pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis bdag cag
130a4: la sgo ba/ sngon ma byung ba'i rtags dang cha lugs can dag mthong na kho bo la sbron cig ces byung ba de dag lhags te sgo na sdod do// des smras pa/ 'jug tu chug shig/ de dag gis 'jug tu bcug pa dang / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis de dag mthong nas dris pa/ shes
130a5: ldan dag khyed cag gang nas 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag lho lam nas so// des smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyed kyis lho lam du ngo mtshar ba mthong ba dang thos pa ci yod/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag re shig bdag cag gis sngar mthong ba dang thos pa'i ngo
130a6: mtshar gzhan dag lta zhog gi/ / de bor mthong ba dang thos pa'i do mtshar gang yin pa dag smra bar byas nyon cig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag smos shig dang kho bar mtshar de dag nyan to// de dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can la ji ltar gyur ba rgyas par brjod pa dang / khyim bdag gas
130a7: can gyis thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar gyes nyi dag zan byin nas smras pa/ shes ldan dgag du 'od/ de dag gis smras pa/ khyim bdag mnyan yod du 'dong ngo // shes ldan dag den ci yod/ khyim bdag de na lha'i brags spyong ral gyis gang la brten te/ yan lag brgya dang ldan
130a8: ba ga baspyang blangs par khyis bdag sa sbyin yod do/ / des smras pa/ shes ldan dgagal te de ltan de la za ze pe yang 'bregs pan gyis 'di nyid du byar gyim tshan mo gyis la dbyar 'das nas pa ba dang ldan cig dadang // de dag nyid du kyar gyi mtshan ma gnas

130b1: 'das nas mnyan yod du 'phags pa dang khyim bdag gdangs can gyis pad sa'i rgyal po shar ba la smras pa/ lha bdag mnyan yod du bgyi ba cung zhig mchis na/ gal te lhas gnang na dar mchi'o// rgyal pos smras pa/ khyim bdag gal te de ltan sod la khyod kyis don bsgrub
130b2: babyas nas myur dbyed shog shig/ nga rgyal pos gnang nas drang srong lnga bcu po de dag dang lhan cig 'phags te mthar gyis banyan yod du phyin nas bskyed mos chal na rjod cing 'dug go/ khyim bdag mag ni sa zas sbyin gyis kyi ma bdag ga dang sa can 'di 'das te/ bskyed pos chal
130b3: na sdod cing 'dug go zhes thos so/ / thos nas kyang des bsams pa/ bdag gis khyim bdag gdangs can ma tsher ba kho nar gnas su bajug tu bzhug pa ni bdag gi tshul dang 'thun pa ma yin gyis/ bkur ste chen pos 'jug tu bzhug go snyam nas des de bkur sti chen pos 'jug tu
130b4: bcug ste/ lam gyis dub pa'i de la bsos nas zan byin no// de nas drang srong de dag lhags nas khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'ongs pa legs so zhes bya ba'i chog gis kun tu spyad de smras pa/ shes ldan dag khyer cag gi las 'ongs/ 'di ci la 'ongs/ de dag gis smras pa
130b5: khyim bdag khyod kyis lha'i bu gso sbyong ral la gang byin pa de dag cag la yang byin cig/ des smras pa/ shes ldan dag mi dran no// khyim bdag bdag cag gis khyod la dran par bya'o// shes ldan dag legs so// de dag gis dran par byas nas des smras pa/ shes ldan
130b6: ngag ci kho bo las len nam/ 'on te bcom ldan 'das las len/ khyim bdag khyod kyis su las blangs/ shes ldan dag bcom ldan 'das las so// khyim bdag gal te de lta na bdag cag kyang de kho na las len to// shes ldan dag legs kyis de ltar gyis shig ces des
130b7: de dag khrid de bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ngo / / de'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi 'khor brgya phrag du ma'i 'dun na chos ston cing bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag mgon med zas spyan thag ring po kho na nas gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang dge slong
130b8: rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin thag ri de po kho na nas 'ong ba mthong ngam/ btsun pa mthong ngo // dge slong dag khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'di skyes dang bcas pas 'ong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes ni 'di ltar gdul ba'i skyes lta

131a1: zugapa med do/ / nas kyi bdag pakon ma nam kyin nga srung lnga brgya' babar dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyibs gnyis lamag pa phyag 'tshal tam pa gcig tu dug/ shA gcig 'duganas somaldan 'dasas rgyas
131a2: bdag mgon med zas sbyin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa drang srong lnga brgya po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das las yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gas sbyong len par 'tshal na/ de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di dag ci nas kyang sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / na
131a3: bdun la sbubs su mchi ba dang / dge bsnyen nyid du 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de ltar chos bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis drang srong lnga brgya po de dag gi bsam pa dang / bgal nyal dang / khams dang / rang bzhin thugs su chud nas gang thos nas drang srong lnga brgya
131a4: dag gis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras mngon sum du byas pa de lta bur 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yang dag par so sor rtogs par byed pa'i chos bstan pa mdzad do/ / de dag gis bden pa mthong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gzugs te gsol ba/ btsun pa bdag cag legs
131a5: par gsungs pa'i tshes 'dul ba la rab tu 'byung ba dang / rdzogs par bsnyen pa dge slong gi dngos po 'thob cing bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshangs par spyad pa spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la dge slong tshur shog ces pas rab tu phung zhing dge slong dag tshur shog/
131a6: tshangs par spyad pa spod cig ces bka' stsal ba dang / de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bka'i 'jug kho nar sgra byi ba dang / snam sbyar gyon par gyur te/ sgra dang / kha spu zhag bdun skyes pa tsam dang / lag pa lhung bzed dang / khyam bum gyis 'brel ba dang / dge slong rdzogs lnga bsten nas lo brgya len ci'i
131a7: spyod lam lta bur gnas par gyur to/ / yang smras pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshur shog bka' stsal pas// spu byi snam sbyar gyon pa'i lus ldan zhing / mod la dbang po rab zhir gnas gyur te/ sangs rgyas dgongs pas lus gzugs bkab par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
131a8: de dag la gdams ngag byin nas de dag gis spro ba dang / 'bad pa dang / brtsal ba dag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du byas shing dgra bcom pa khams gsum pa las 'dod chags dang bral ba bong ba dang gser nga mnyam pa/ nem mkha' dang

131b1: phag mthal du mtshungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ tsan dan gzhag pa lta bu/ rig pas sgo nga'i sbubs dral bar gyur cing rig pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa/ srid pa dang / 'dod pa'i rnyed pa dang / bkur sti la rgyab kyis phyogs pa/ dbang po dang
131b2: nye dbang dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mngon du smra bar bya bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag gdangs can bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
131b3: te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go/ mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das khyim bdag gdangs can la chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid kyis yang dag par ston par mdzad/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par mdzad/ yang dag par gzeng stod par mdzad/
131b4: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad cing / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus sngar mdzad pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i bka' mchid gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i bka' mchid dang / tshul khrims kyi bka' mchid dang / mtho ris kyi bka' mchi
131b5: dang / 'dod pa rnams kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / nges par 'byung pa dang / rab tu dben pa'i phan yon dang / rnam par byang ba'i phyogs dang 'thun pa'i chos dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do// gang
131b6: gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de sems rangs pa dang / sems nyams pa de ba dang / sems dga' ba dang / sems la sgrib pa med pa dang / yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa kun shes pa'i skal ba dang ldan zhing mthu yod par gzigs pa de'i tshe na sangs rgyas bcom/
131b7: ldan 'das rnams kyi yang dag phul gyi chos bstan pa gang yin pa 'di lta ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam dag rgya cher ston par mdzad do// 'di lta ste dper na gos dag pa na gnog med pa kha basbyar du rung
131b8: chen du bcug na chen legs par mdzen par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyis kyang stan de nyid la bdug bzhin du 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sdug bsngal dang / gun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mngon par rtogs

132a1: bar gyur to/ / de nas khyim bdag gdangs can chos mthong ba dang / chos thob pa dang / chos rig pa dang / chos kyi gting slebs pa dang / som nyi las rgal ba dang / the tshom las rgal ba dang / ston pa'i bstan pa la gzhan gyi dring mi
132a2: 'dzeg pa dang / gzhan gyis mi bkri zhing chos rnams la mi 'jigs pa thob nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba dang logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
132a3: btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags so// btsun pa bdag ni mngon par zhugs pa lags te/ btsun pa bdag bcom ldan 'das dang / chos dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi yis/ bdag dge bsnyen du bzung du gsol/ deng
132a4: slan cad nas ji srid 'tsho'i bar du glo ba thag pa nas mngon par dad pas skyabs su mchi'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag khyod med ca/ btsun pa bdag nor bzangs shes bgyi ba las rgyal po shar
132a5: bas bdag gdangs las 'tshal bas de'i slad du bdag skye bo dag gis khyim bdag gdangs can zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das kau sham+bIr gshegs par gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji srid
132a6: mtsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / bskur ba'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur 'tshal lo// khyim bdag kau shim+bin gtsug lag khang yod dam/ btsun pa ma mchis so// khyim bdag dge slong dag ni gang na gtsug lag
132a7: khang yod pa der bgrod pa dang / 'gro ba dang / gnas par sems so// bcom ldan 'das gshegs su gsol dang / bdag gis ji ltar kau sham+bi na gtsug lag khang mchis par gyur pa dang / dge slong rnams kyang bgrod pa dang / mche ba dang / gnas par sems par 'gyur
132a8: ba de ltar bgyi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim bdag gdangs can la cang mi gsung bar gnang ngo // de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis cang mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal

132b1: te bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas song nas de la mnyan yod na bya ba 'am/ byed pa ci yod pa de thams cad byas shing bsgrubs nas yang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
132b2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la grogs dge slong 'ga' zhig stsol cig dang bdag gis de dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das kyi slad du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis khyim
132b3: bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / kau sham+bi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshigs dag dge slong 'di gang gdul ba yin snyam du dgongs na/ dge slong sul byed chen po'i gdul ba yin par gzigs nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan bskul byed
132b4: chen po la bka' stsal pa/ srul byed khyim bdag gdangs can 'khor dang bcas pa dang / kau sham+bin gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs la soms shig/ tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos bcom ldan 'das las cang mi smra bas dang du blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed
132b5: chen po de nyid kyi mtshan mo 'das nas snga dro sham thabs bgos lhung bzed dang / tshes gos thogs te/ mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la zhugs so// mnyan yod du bsod snyoms la brgyus nas zas kyi bya ba byas te/ phyi ma'i zas kyi bsod snyoms las phyir log pas ji
132b6: ltar longs spyad pa'i gnas mal mkhos su phab ste/ lhung bzed dang / chos gos thogs nas khyim bdag gdangs can dang 'grogs te/ ko sham+bi ga la ba der logs su song nas mthar gyis rgyu zhing 'gro ba na kau sham+bir phyin to// de nas khyim bdag gdangs can kau
132b7: sham+bi ma zhugs pa kho nar kun dga' ra ba nas kun dga' ra bar/ bskyed mos tshal nas bskyed mos tshal du/ tshal nas tshal du dang gol bar song ste/ gang du bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug pa'i sa phyogs kau sham+bi nas
132b8: ha cang yang me red ha cang yang me nye ba nyid mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing bla gcor chung ba/ mtshan mo sgra chung zhing 'ur sgra chung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi rig pa nyung ba de lta bu ci yod ces btsal na/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyis

133a1: rang gi kun dga'ar bko sha rtsi nas ha cad yang mi ring ha cang yang mi nye ba nyin mo rgyun lugs nyung zhing zla gcor chung ba/ mtshan mo sga chung zhing 'ur sgra rung ba/ sha sbrang dang / sbrang bu dang / rlung dang / nyi ma dang / sdig sbrul gyi reg pa nyung bar mthong ngo //
133a2: mthong nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te/ sa phyogs 'di bzang gis 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rtsig tu gzhug go snyam mo// de na khyim bdag gdangs can dang / tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos bskyed mos tshal der bcom ldan
133a3: 'das kyi phyir gtsug lag khang rta babs mthon po dang ldan pa/ skar khung dang / skar bud zlum po dang / lan kan gyis brgyan pa rtsig tu bcug go/ de nas gtsug lag khang byas shing zin nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po la 'di
133a4: skad ces smras so/ / 'phags pa bcom ldan 'das shul du gshegs pa'i gshegs dgongs kyi tshad ci tsam/ khyim bdag 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang 'dra'o// 'phags pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i ji tsam/ khyim bdag
133a5: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lam du 'gro ba'i dgongs mal ni rgyang grags bcu'o/ / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis rgyang grags bcur gshegs dgongs sa dag shom du bcug nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pho nya btang ste/ bcom ldan 'das kau sham+bir
133a6: gshegs su gsol/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa ji srid 'tsho'i bar du na bza' dang / bsod snyoms dang / gnas mal dang / bskud pa'i rkyen dang / sman gyi yo byad dag gis bsnyen bkur bgyi'o zhes gsol to// po nyas kyang
133a7: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar song ste gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo sod la dge slong rnams la dge slong dag bcom ldan 'das bad sa dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis khyed cag las gang
133a8: de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig bad ma dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo shig/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes bcom ldan 'das las mnyan nas dge slong rnams la tshe dang ldan pa dag

133b1: bcom ldan 'das bdas dag tu ljongs rgyur gshegs kyis byed cag las gang de bzhin gshegs pa dang thabs cig pad ma dag tu ljongs rgyur 'gro bar spro ba des chos gos dag long shig ces bsgo'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dul ba 'khor dul ba dang ldan pa/
133b2: zhi ba 'khor zhi ba dang ldan pa/ grol ba 'khor grol ba dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa 'khor dbugs phyin pa dang ldan pa/ thul ba 'khor thul ba dang ldan pa/ dgra bcom pa 'khor dgra bcom pa dang ldan pa/ 'dod chags dang bral ba 'khor 'dod chags dang bral ba dang
133b3: ldan pa/ mdzes pa 'khor mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ khyu mchog ltar ba lang gi tshigs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ glang po che ltar glang po che'i phrug gu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ seng ge ltar mche ba can gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar
133b4: dad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nam mkha' lding ltar bya'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ bram ze ltar slob ma'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ sman pa mkhas pa ltar nad pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dpa' bo ltar ru ba'i tshogs kyis
133b5: yongs su bskor ba/ sa mkhan ltar lam du zhugs pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ ded dpon ltar tshod pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshong dpon ltar 'khor gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mthar gyi rgyal po ltar blon po'i tshogs kyis
133b6: yongs su bskor ba/ 'khor los skur ba ltar bu stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ zla ba ltar rgyu skar gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nyi ma ltar 'od zer stong gi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ yul 'khor srung ltar dri za'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor
133b7: 'phags skem po gar grul bum gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ mig mi bzang ltar klu'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ nor sbyin ltar gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ thags zangs ris ltar lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ brgya
133b8: byini ltar sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ tshangs pa ltar tshangs ris kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba/ dbang po rnams kyis shin tu dul ba/ spyod lam dang spyod pa ma 'khrugs pa/ chu gter ltar ting nge ba/ sprin ltar chu dang bcas pa/ glang po

134a1: che'i rgyal po ltar dregs pa dang bral ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcus sku rnam par mdzes pa/ 'od 'dom gang gis gzugs can brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong pas
134a2: lhag pa'i 'od dang ldan pa/ rin po che'i ribo 'gro ba ltar kun du bzang ba/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ma 'dres pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum dang / thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa kun shes kau N+Di n+yas dang / rlangs pa dang / ming cen
134a3: dang / ma 'gags pa dang / shA ri'i bu dang / maud gal gyi bu dang / 'od srung dang / kun dga' bo dang / nam gu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po dag dang / gzhan yang dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos bskor te/ kau sham+be ga la ba der rgyu zhing gshegs nas
134a4: mthar gyis rgyu zhing gshegs pa na kau sham+bIr byon to/ / de nas khyim bdag gdangs can gyis gtsug lag khang yo byad thams cad dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la phul nas/ 'di ltar gnas brtan dag gis kyang bcom
134a5: ldan 'das kau sham+bin gdangs can gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes mdo sde'i mtha' nye bar sbyar to/ / de nas khyim bdag gdangs bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la gtsug lag khang phul nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba
134a6: skyes te rang gi khyim du song ngo / / de nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te mtha' gcig tu 'dug go// mtha' gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe
134a7: dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa chu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig/
134a8: mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba/ rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de la bka' stsal

134b1: skul byed rung ste/ skal byed bdun po 'di dag ni gang dag dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel
134b2: ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon cha ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ skul byed 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa
134b3: dang ldan pas phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la kun dga'i ra ba 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi
134b4: 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dang po yin no// skul byed gzhan yang
134b5: rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas kun dga' ba de nyid du gtsug lag khang rtsig tu 'jug pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa chu ba 'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba 'am/ me nyal ba las rtag
134b6: tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon cha ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gnyis pa yin no// skul byed
134b7: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gtsug lag khang de nyid tu gnas mal 'di lta ste/ khri dang / khri'u dang / stan nang tshangs can dang / la ba dang / sngas dang / gor bu dag 'bul bar byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na
134b8: rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las

135a1: byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no// sul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas gtsug lag khang de nyid du
135a2: gtan gyi rkyen ris rjes su 'thun pa'i mchod sbyin 'dul bar byed pa 'di na spel byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyaba'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba'am/ mnyil ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad bang bsod nam/
135a3: 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon cha ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba/ bzhi pa yin no// srul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/
135a4: rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas glo bur du 'ongs pa dang 'gro bar chas pa la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni srul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan bcu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu
135a5: rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye brdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shini du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba chag/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no// skul byed gzhan
135a6: yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas nang pa dang nad gsog la sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa 'di ni sul byi dgang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa bya ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu
135a7: rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mengon par 'bel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shin nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba cheg/ rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no// skul byed
135a8: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas rlung langs pa 'am/ yul ngan byung ba'am/ char yab pa'am/ lhags pa byung ba gang dag yin pa de lta bu'i rlung langs pa'am/ yul na byu ba'am/ zab pa'am/ lhags pa byung ba'i tshe dge 'dun

135b1: zas can dgag ma/ skyom dag gam/ thug pa'i btung ba dag bskyal te/ 'dis 'phags pa 'di dag lus mi dran pa dang / chos gos mi gsher ba dang / longs spyad na bde ba la reg par 'gyur ro snyam pas 'dul bar byed pa 'di ni spel byed gang dang ldan na/
135b2: rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang pa dang ldan pa chu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mnyel ba la ya rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas pa klu ma mi yod sa
135b3: bya ba'i gan shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon cheg/ skang ba chab/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no// sbrul byed rigs kyi buM'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las zung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang / ldan pa'i bsod nams sum
135b4: bsod nams kyi 'bras bu 'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa 'di tsam ma zhes bsod nams kyi tshad bzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar bsod nams mang pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// skul byed 'di lta ste dper na/
135b5: gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste/ gang gA dang / ya mun dang / sar yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la ni chu'am/ chu'i bum pa 'am chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa
135b6: 'bum phrag 'di snyed yod do zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus so/ / skul byed de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi ba dran po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras
135b7: bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'dacom ma zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi rus te/ 'di ltar bsod nams mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gre'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / com
135b8: ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to/ / btsun pa gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan parku pa 'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rkun mi 'chad par bsod nams

136a1: shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma lags pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba rgyas pa che ba gdags su rung ngam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
136a2: stsal pa/ skul byed rung ste/ skul byed bdun po 'di dag ni gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ me nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' zhig mngon par 'phel ba
136a3: dang / / bsod nams baba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dag yin te/ bdun gang zhe na/ skul byed 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang ba dang
136a4: ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong tshigs ga ge mo zhig na nye bar rten ci de bzhugs pa thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skel
136a5: byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dang ba dang ldan pa rgya ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las
136a6: byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba dang po yin no// skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang ba dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
136a7: nyan thos de nyid du tshur gshegs par rtsol bar thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang ba dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa 'am
136a8: nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin tu 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba

136b1: gnyis pa yin no/ / skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid shul du zhugs pa thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po dag pa nges par 'byung
136b2: pa dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang ba dang ldan pa rgyu ba'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams
136b3: 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba gsum pa yin no// skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa
136b4: 'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid grong tshigs de nyid du byon par thos shing thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po de dge banges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gang dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am
136b5: gnas pa'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon cheg snang ba che ga
136b6: rgyas pa che ba bzhi pa yin no/ / skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro zhing mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog
136b7: tu dga' ba rgya chen po dge ba des par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni skul byed gar dang ldan na rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa'am/ nyal ba 'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig
136b8: mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams baba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba lnga pa yin no// skul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang ba

137a1: dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyen thos de nyid kyi drung sa chos tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dgeg/ tha mar dge gdon bzang po// tshig 'grubazang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su
137a2: dag pa/ yongs su byang ba yang dag par ba du ston pa nyan ci thos nas kyang dga' ba dang / mchog du dga' ba rgya chen po dge pa nges par 'byung ba dang ldan pa thob par byed pa 'di ni sbal byed ga dang ldan na rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ngang pa dang ldan pa sgrub 'am
137a3: gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon che ge stang
137a4: ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba drug pa yin no// sul byed gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa'am de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos de nyid kyi drung nas chos zos nas sangs rgyas la skyabs su 'gro/ chos dang / dge
137a5: 'dun la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa'i gzhi dag len par byed pa 'di ni skul byed rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa rgyu ba 'am/ gnas pa 'am/ nyal ba'am/ mi nyal ba las rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'ba' shig mngon par
137a6: 'phel ba dang / bsod nams 'ba' shig nye bar skye ba rdzas las zung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi shin du 'bras bu che ba/ phan yon tsha ba/ snang ba che ba/ rgyas pa che ba bdun pa yin no// sul byed rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun
137a7: po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa ni 'di tsam mo zhes bsod nams kyi tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar bsod nams
137a8: mang ba'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ / skul byed 'di lta ste dper na gang du chu klung chen po lnga po 'di lta ste gang gA dang / ya mu na dang / sa ra yu dang / gnas can dang / ma hi zhes bya ba tha mi dad par 'bab par 'gyur ba de la

137b1: ni chu 'am/ chu'i bum pa 'am/ chu'i bum pa brgya phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa stong phrag gam/ chu'i bum pa 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes chu'i tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar chu mang ba'i phyir chu'i phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// skul byed de
137b2: bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i gzhi bdun po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams sam/ bsod nams kyi 'bras bu'am bsod nams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang 'di tsam mo zhes
137b3: tshad gzung bar mi nus te/ 'di ltar bsod nams mang pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal te/ bde bar gshegs pas de skad gsungs nas/ ston pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces
137b4: bka' stsal to/ / mi dang ri dgas tshogs kyis bsten pa yi// chu klung tha dad 'bab par gyur pa dag/ mtshe mchog bkra shis gtsang ma dogs bde ba// rin chen 'byung nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin bsod nams rgyan kyang rnam kun tu// sbyin bdag gos
137b5: sbyin zas skom sbyin pa dang / / mal cha stan dang gding sbyin mi la 'bab// chu klung chu 'bab rgya mtshor ji bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa skul byed chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon
137b6: bar bstod do/ / de nas khyim bdag gdangs can ni dad pa dang ldan pa de'i 'khor na ma dad nas des bsams pa/ bdag gi 'khor 'di ma dad na bdag gi gtsug lag khang du ji ltar spyod pa je brtag go snyam nas de cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar
137b7: bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / rgan zhugs shig // khang na 'dug nas des de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa gtsug lag khang
137b8: snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags/ des smras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o// 'phags pa ci 'di gtsug lag khang lags sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ bzhin bzangs gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/ phongs/

138a1: 6/ ba ni rig bu/ 'phags pa gdan yo byang dun sus tshogs pa ni gnag lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so// bzhin bzas 'di phongs pa yin no// di ltar gyur/ khyim bdag don dad pa dang ldan pa yin
138a2: na de'i 'khor pa dang pas mkho ba mi stobs so/ / 'di ltar khyim bdag de la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dag pa'i bsam pa can zhig yod na/ 'on kyang de khyim de na dbang med de/ gal te de la dbang yod par byung na de dge slong
138a3: rnams la la kho ba stobs par byed pas 'di gtsug lag khang du 'gyur ro/ / khyim bdag gdangs can gyis bsams pa/ da ltar bdag gson pa nyid na yang bdag gi gtsug lag khang na dge slong rnams kyi gnas skabs 'di 'dran bdag shin ci 'dra bar 'gyur sbyar
138a4: du rig ras dge slong de'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi khyim du song nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag las gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing long shig/ de'i tshen mgu byed bum pa thogs te chu
138a5: bcu ba'i phyir phyir byung ba dang / des der ras ma zhig rnyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang de la phan gdags pa'i slad du phyogs der gshegs pa dang / des bcom ldan 'das la brtag par brtsams so// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis na bza' chos
138a6: gos kyi grwa rdol bar de la bstan pa dang / des bsams pa/ gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi ras ma 'di bzhes su gnang na bdag gis 'di bcom ldan 'das la dbul lo snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i sems thugs kyis mkhyen nas
138a7: bka' stsal pa/ mgu byed gal te khyod kyis yongs su btang na phul cig/ des bcom ldan 'das la sems mngon par dang pa byas nas gus pa skyed de bul lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis de de nyid kyi mdun du na bza' tshas gos kyi glar klan te btsems pa dang
138a8: kha dog 'thun par gyur to/ / de dang pa skyes pas zhabs gnyis la gtugs te smon lam btab pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bran mor ma gyur cig/ dbul bar ma gyur cig nas smras nas bum pa chus bkang ste khyim du song ngo // khyim bdag gangs can

138b1: gyis nang mi la tshul shing brims pa dang / mgu byed kyis smras pa/ khyim bdag 'di ci legs/ gdangs can gyis smras pa/ mgu byed khyed cag las gang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed par spro ba des tshul shing long shig/
138b2: dang kho bo la longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod do// des myur ba myur bar chu'i bum pa bzhag ste tshul shing blangs nas smras pa/ bdag sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur bgyid par spro ste/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge
138b3: 'dun dang bcas pa la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bgyi yis khyod thugs las chung ngur mdzod cig ces des sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bstabs te gus par bsnyen bkur bya bar brtsams so/ / khyim bdag
138b4: gdangs can gyis yang cha lugs mi mngon par byas te sham thabs dma' bar bgos nas gtsug lag khang du song ste tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis mchod rten la phyag 'tshal nas gtsug lag khang du 'jug par brtsams pa dang / yang rgan zhugs gzhan zhig sgo bang
138b5: na 'dug nas des de'i nang pa la phyag 'tshal te smras pa/ 'phags pa gtsug lag khang snying dang mig 'phrog par bgyid pa mtho ris kyi them skas su gyur pa 'di su'i lags// des spras pa/ khyim bdag gdangs can gyi'o// 'phags pa ci tsug lag khang lags
138b6: sam/ 'on te phongs pa lags/ banin bzangs gtsug lag khang ni ji lta bu/ phongs pa ni rdo lte bu/ 'phags pa gad na yo byad phun sum tshogs pa na gtsug lag khang lags la/ gang na yo byad ma mchis pa ni phongs pa lags so// bzhin bzangs 'di
138b7: sngon ni phongs par gyur pa las da ni gtsug khang du gyur to/ / ji ltar gyur/ bzhin bzangs khyim bdag gdangs can la bu mo mngag gzhug ma mgu byed ces bya ba dad pa dang ldan zhing bzang la dge ba'i bsam pa can zhig yod pa de khyim bdag des 'dir las su
138b8: bskos te sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis stobs shig ces bsgo nas/ da ltar de sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed pas des na 'di gtsug lag khang yin te/

139a1: phongs pa ma yin no// khyim bdag gangs can gyis thos nas dga' ste khyim du song nas des bu mo mgu byed kyi lag tu lde mig dang / lde mig kyog po gtad nas nang mi rnams la smras pa/ khyed cag mgu byed kyis ci byin pa des gnas par
139a2: gyis shig/ kau sham+bi na gnas pa'i skye bo'i tshogs rnams kyang bsdus te smras pa/ shes ldan dag kho bos bu mo mgu byed 'di bran mo las phyung ste khyim gyi bdag mor bcug go zhes bsgrags so// dge slong rnams the tshom skyes nas the tshom thams cad
139a3: gcod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ btsun pa khyim bdag gdangs can rgyal po shar bas gdangs las 'tshal ba la gzigs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag da ltar du ma zad de 'di ltar 'das pa'i dus na yang
139a4: khyim bdag gdangs can 'di rgyal po shar bas gdangs las shes par gyur te de nyon cig/ dge slong dag sngon byung ba grong khyer bA rA Na sIn rgyal po tshangs sbyin zhes bya bas rgyal srid 'byor pa/ rgyas pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba/
139a5: thab mo dang / 'thab pa dang / phyi dgra dang / nad 'khrug rab tu zhi ba/ chom kun dang / mu ge dang / nad dang bral ba/ sa lu dang / bu ram shing gi phreng ba dang / ba lang dang / ma he phun sum tshogs pa byed du bcug ste/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal pos chos kyis rgyal
139a6: srid byed du bcug go/ ji tsam dus gzhan zhig na ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis rang gi yul du zil bsgrags byed du bcug ste phyogs su bsgo ba/ de'i yul na gnas pa dang / pho brang 'khor gyi
139a7: mi dag nyon cig ltas pa dag gis lo bcu gnyis su char mi 'bab par lung bstan gyis de'i phyir khyed cag las gang dag la lo bcu gnyis kyi zan bdog pa de dag gis ni 'khod par bya'o/ / gang dag la mi bdog pa de dag gis ni gzhan du 'dong par bya zhing lo
139a8: bcu gnyis 'das nas phyir 'ong bar bya'o/ / de'i tshe na bA rA Na sI na khyim bdag gzungs byed ces bya ba phyug pa/ nor mang ba/ longs spyod che ba/ yongs su gzung ba yangs shing rgya che ba zhig 'dug pa des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa 'o

139b1: 'khor dang bcas pa'i lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba med pa'i tshe rang sangs rgyas dman pa dang bkren pa la rjes su snying brtse ba/ bas mtha'i gnas mal la dga' ba/ bse ru lta bu gcig
139b2: bu 'jig rten gyi yon gnas su gyur pa dag 'jig rten du byung ngo / / ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya ljongs rgyu zhing 'dod pa na bA ra Na sIr byin nas de dag khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu
139b3: byung ba lnga brgyal lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stobs par nus sam/ des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la smras te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzod pa bos te smras pa/ kri'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa dang / rab tu byung ba lnga brgya po 'di dag
139b4: gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo// de dag der 'khod do// ji tsam na rang sangs rgyas
139b5: gzhan lnga brgya ljongs rgya zhing 'dod pa na bA rA Na sIrari phyin nas de dag kyang khyim bdag gzungs byed kyi gan du dong ste phyin nas smras pa/ khyim bdag khyod kyis kho bo cag rab tu byung ba lnga brgyal lo bcu gnyis su mkho ba stobs par nus sam// des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag
139b6: khyed la gsol lags na/ ci'i slad du yang sgrub par mdzad/ khyim bdag de dag kyang gzhan la kho bo cag kyang gzhan no// 'phags pa dag je mdzod pa la smras te slad kyis gsol lo zhes des mdzad pa bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje mdzod pa kho bo 'khor dang bcas pa
139b7: dang rab tu byung ba stong gi lo bcu gnyis kyi zan yod dam/ des smras pa/ jo bo mchis so// khyim bdag gzungs byed kyis rang sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag la smras pa/ 'phags pa dag mchis kyis bzhugs shig dang gsol lo// de dag kyang der 'khod do// khyim
139b8: bdag gzungs byed kyis sbyin pa'i khang pa rtsig tu bcug ste/ sbyin po'i zhal ta bi'i mi dag dang spyan 'dren bskos nas spyan 'dren des nyi ma re re zhing song ste gdugs cid la 'bong bar byed do// spyan 'dren des bye zhig gsos pa de nyi ma re re zhing spyan 'dren de dang lhan cig/

140a1: bya// 'gro bar byed do// ji tsam ngas gzhan zhig na sun 'dren de la brel ba zhig byung nas/ des je 'di bsgrubs te phyis spyan drang par bya'o snyam nas de gzhan du song pa dang / khyi des de ma rnyed nas sngon goms pas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gan du song ba dang / der
140a2: yang de ma mthong nas des skad phyung ngo / / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi dge 'dun gyi gnas brtan gang yin pa des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa dag spyan 'dren dus las yol nas khyi 'dis spyan drangs kyis tshur spyon bzhud do// de ltar bgyi'o zhes de dag 'phags pa dang
140a3: spyan 'dren 'angs te khyi des de mthong nas skad dbyung bar brtsams pa dang / spyan 'dren gyis bsams pa/ 'dis 'di dag spyan drangs pas/ dos na bdag nyid chen po 'di dag byon gor ma chag snyam du gi nas smras pa/ 'phags pa dag khyed sus spyan drangs/ de dag gi
140a4: smras pa/ bzhin bzangs kying dis so// des smras pa/ 'phags pa dag ma nongs kyis slad kyis kyang gang gi tshe bdag la brel ba 'ga' zhig byung ba de'i tshe na 'di nyid khyed spyan 'dren par 'gyur gyis khyed cag gshegs su gsol/ dge slong dag de'i tshe de'i dus na
140a5: bdag gzungs byed gang yin pa de ni de nyid yin no/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na mjed pa gang yin pa de ni khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na sun 'dren gang yin pa de ni bad sa'i rgyal po shar ba yin no// de'i tshe de'i dus na khyi gang yin pa de ni khyim
140a6: ga gdangs can yin te/ khyim bdag gdadas can 'di de'i tshe yang rgyal po shar bas gdangs las shes par gyur la/ da ltar yang 'di des gdangs las shes so// rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i gan du mi stong thub gcig 'ongs nas rgyal pos de la sbas
140a7: pa/ kwa'i nang rje khyod su yin/ des smras pa/ lha bdag stong thub lags so// rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba/ shes ldan dag stong thub la 'tsho ba byin cig/ de dag gis de la 'tshe ba byin no// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ma ga d+hAr byung ba'i
140a8: rgyal po bzo sbyangs gzugs can snying po lha brgyad khri dang ma ga d+hA ba'i bram ze dang / khyim bdaga' bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig bden pa dag la bzhag pa de'i tshe na des rgyal po'i khab tu dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ rgyal po'i khab na gnas pa dang

140b1: pho brang 'khor gyi mi dang / yul tha dad pa nas lpags pa'i skye bo'i tshogs shes ldan dag nyon cig/ nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o// nga'i yul du gang rkun po byed pa de ngas yul med par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni darang gi mdzod dang bang ba nas sbyin
140b2: nazhes bsre'o/ / gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ko sa lar byung ba'i rgyal po gsal rgyal gzhon nu'i dpe'i mdos btul ba de'i tshe na des kyang mnyan yod du dril bsgrags pa byed du bcug ste bsgo ba/ nga'i yul du sus kyang rkun po mi bya'o// nga'i yul du gang rkun
140b3: po byed pa de das gsad par bya zhing brkus pa rnams kyi nor ni da rang gi mdzod dang bdab nas sbyin no zhes bsgo'o/ / bar du yul ma ga d+ha na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na gnas pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa de dag mtshams kyi bar du dong
140b4: ste 'khod cing yul ma ga d+hA nas don 'thun pa gang dag 'od ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed/ yul ko sa la nas don 'thun pa gang dag 'od ba de dag kyang 'joms par byed nas thams cad du yul ma gad+han 'khod pa'i chom rkun pa gang dag yin pa dang / yul ko sa la na 'khod pa'i
140b5: cha ba ku dpagang dag yin pade dag mtshams kyi bar du dong ste 'khod cing don 'thun 'joms par byed pas don 'thun 'gro ba dang 'od ba rgyun chad de/ rgyal po'i dpya dang lo thang mi 'du'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i sgra grags par gyur to// rgyal po gzugs can snying pos de thos nas ru gcig pa dang
140b6: nad btsam ning rab tu bcom ste phyir 'ongs so/ / de bzhin du ru gnyis pa dang / ru gsum pa btang na de yang bcom zhing rab tu bcom ste phyir 'od sa so// ji tsam na yul ma ga d+hA nas don 'thun yul ko sa lar 'phags pa de chom rkun pas 'jigs pas rgyal po'i khab tu
140b7: zhugs te bsel ba tshol bar byed nas blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la smras pa/ lha stong thub 'di lha'i 'tsho bas 'tsho na ci'i slad du don 'thun gyi bsel mi bgyid/ rgyal pos smras pa/ de 'grol rig gis zong shig/ blon po rnams kyis de bos te smras pa/ kwa'i nang rje ljod
140b8: rgyal po'i 'tsho bas 'tshol ci'i phyir rgyal po'i bka' bzhin mi byed/ des smras pa/ khyed kyis bsgo ba gang zhig kho bos ma byas na de skad du skyo bar byed/ de dag gis smras pa/ don 'thun 'di yul ko sa lar 'gros 'di'i bsel gyis shig/ des smras pa/ mnyes kyis

141a1: de ltar bya'o zhes des mda' lnga brgya pa'i dod pa gnyis thogs te shing rtar zhugs nas don 'thun gyi mdun du 'phags so/ / chom rkun pa rnams kyis de don 'thun gyi mdun nas 'od pa thag ring po kho na nas mthong nas/ de la po nya btang
141a2: ste bsgo ba/ chom rkun pa'i dmag dpon na re shing rta byir zlog shig/ gnod pa thob par gyur ter zhes zer ro// des smras pa/ dpa' bo la dpa' bo'i longs su spang ba byin cig/ tshem rkun pa'i pho nyas smras pa/ ci khyod gcig pu dpa' bo yin nam/
141a3: cag kyang dpa' bo yin gyis phyir log shig/ de nas san tshun mda' khar dgye bar brtsams nas des chom rkun pa'i pho nya'i gnad du bsnun nas de phyir log go// de bzhin du chom rkun pa gnyis dang / ban dang / brgyad dang / bcu drug dang / sum bcu rtsa gnyis
141a4: dang / drug bcu rtsa bzhi nas chom rkun pa lnga brgya'i bar dag lhags nas des de dag gi gnad du bsnun nas de dag phyir log go// de bzhin du chom rkun pa gzhan lnga brgya lhags nas des de dag la smras pa/ ngas khyed kyi chom rkun pa lnga brgya bsad na byed cag kyang
141a5: srog gis 'gebs par mi 'dod dam/ phyir log shig/ chom rkun pa rnams kyis smras pa/ ded kyi gcig kyang ma song na ci'i phyir dang phyir ldog khyod kyang rung ded kyang rung ngo // des smras pa/ gal te khyed cag yid mi ches na gang dag ngas
141a6: bsnun pa de dag gi go phudang cig/ de dag gis go 'bud bar brtsams pa dang / gang gis ji ltar go bung bde de ltar dus la bab nas chom rkun pa de dag mi 'di ni gnod sbyin zhig go zhes byer te dong do// stong thub mtshams kyi bang na 'dug cing de don 'thun yul ko sa la nas
141a7: 'di ba gang yin pa de'i bas la yang byed/ yul ma ga d+hA nas 'ong ba gang yin pa de'i bsel yang byed do// des bsams pa/ bdag gis ci'i phyir par 'gro chung 'gro bya 'di nyid du 'dug par bya'o snyam nas des der byim brtsags te 'dug nas don 'thun gci ga'i
141a8: gnas su'ang gyur/ de 'breg na gnas pa yin pas 'brog gnas 'brog gnas shes bya ba'i ming du gyur to// / 'dul ba rnam par 'byed pa/ bas po bdun bcu rtsa bzhi pa/ 'brog gnas su don 'gran dag lhags nas bcig gis ni

141b1: 'bras btsong par brtsams so/ / kha cig gis ni phye btsong bar brtsams/ kha cig gis ni be reg/ kha cig gis ni khur ba/ kha cig gis ni ri lu btsong bar brtsams so// chang 'tshong dag gis kyang chang btsong bar brtsams te/ de nyid du 'khod nas der tshong 'dus
